title: Gas Prices Skyrocketing! The Unleaded Truth About Who’s to Blame
description:
The U.S. just announced a Russian oil ban. As gas prices skyrocket, we'll explain how it's Joe Biden's fault and NOT Putin's. Former UFC champion Cain Velasquez shot at a pedo in the pro-pedo state of California. We have the latest. And because we owe it to the people, we get into the Kanye vs. Pete Davidson beef. #GasPrices #Ukraine #FreeCain
